SEARCH
Package aor.fpbackend.service

Class AssetService

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.service.AssetService
@Path("/assets") public class AssetService extends Object
AssetService is a JAX-RS resource class that provides RESTful endpoints for managing assets.

  • Method Details

    • createAsset

      @POST @Path("/create") @Consumes("application/json") public void createAsset(@Valid @Valid AssetCreateDto assetCreateDto, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws DuplicatedAttributeException, UserNotFoundException
      Creates a new asset.
      Parameters:
      assetCreateDto - the AssetCreateDto containing asset details.
      securityContext - the SecurityContext containing the security details.
      Throws:
      DuplicatedAttributeException - if the asset already exists.
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found.

    • addAssetToProject

      @POST @Path("/add/project") @Consumes("application/json") public void addAssetToProject(@Valid @Valid ProjectAssetCreateDto projectAssetCreateDto) throws EntityNotFoundException, ElementAssociationException
      Adds an asset to a project.
      Parameters:
      projectAssetCreateDto - the ProjectAssetCreateDto containing asset and project details.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the project or asset is not found.
      ElementAssociationException - if there is an issue with the association.

    • getAllAssets

      @GET @Path("") @Produces("application/json") public List<AssetGetDto> getAllAssets()
      Retrieves all assets.
      Returns:
      a list of AssetGetDto representing all assets.

    • getFilteredAssets

      @GET @Path("/all/filter") @Produces("application/json") public AssetPaginatedDto getFilteredAssets(@QueryParam("page") @DefaultValue("1") int page, @QueryParam("pageSize") @DefaultValue("8") int pageSize, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo) throws InputValidationException
      Retrieves filtered assets based on pagination and query parameters.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number for pagination.
      pageSize - the number of items per page.
      uriInfo - the UriInfo containing the query parameters.
      Returns:
      an AssetPaginatedDto representing the paginated and filtered assets.
      Throws:
      InputValidationException - if the input data is invalid.

    • getProjectAssetsByProject

      @GET @Path("/project/{projectId}") @Produces("application/json") public List<ProjectAssetGetDto> getProjectAssetsByProject(@PathParam("projectId") long projectId)
      Retrieves assets associated with a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - the ID of the project.
      Returns:
      a list of ProjectAssetGetDto representing the assets of the project.

    • getAssetById

      @GET @Path("/id/{assetId}") @Produces("application/json") public AssetGetDto getAssetById(@PathParam("assetId") long assetId)
      Retrieves an asset by its ID.
      Parameters:
      assetId - the ID of the asset.
      Returns:
      an AssetGetDto representing the asset.

    • getAssetsFirstLetter

      @GET @Path("/first/letter") @Produces("application/json") public List<AssetGetDto> getAssetsFirstLetter(@QueryParam("value") String firstLetter)
      Retrieves assets whose names start with a specific letter.
      Parameters:
      firstLetter - the initial letter of the asset names.
      Returns:
      a list of AssetGetDto representing the assets.

    • getAssetTypes

      @GET @Path("/enum/types") @Produces("application/json") public List<AssetTypeEnum> getAssetTypes()
      Retrieves the list of asset types.
      Returns:
      a list of AssetTypeEnum representing the asset types.

    • removeProjectAssetFromProject

      @PUT @Path("/remove/project/{projectId}") @Consumes("application/json") public void removeProjectAssetFromProject(@Valid @Valid ProjectAssetRemoveDto projectAssetRemoveDto) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Removes an asset from a project.
      Parameters:
      projectAssetRemoveDto - the ProjectAssetRemoveDto containing asset and project details.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the asset or project is not found.

    • updateAsset

      @PUT @Path("") @Consumes("application/json") public void updateAsset(@Valid @Valid AssetUpdateDto assetUpdateDto) throws EntityNotFoundException, InputValidationException
      Updates an existing asset.
      Parameters:
      assetUpdateDto - the AssetUpdateDto containing the updated asset details.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if the asset is not found.
      InputValidationException - if the input data is invalid.
